name: Bingle
description:
Peg-bouncing arcade game inspired by a certain well-known classic. Primarily mouse-controlled (save for exiting menu/game with ESC), easy to learn but hard to master, and yes, there's a bucket level.

Some behaviors may be slightly flaky, particularly the partial clear when passing over a spot multiple times. (the clear when momentum is lost should typically kick in after a bit - patience may be required).

Included orx DLL has been compressed with UPX, and may cause AV false positives.

Created for the 4MB Game Jam.

Updates:
- Version 3, 2021-06-10 (~4:30 cst): Bucket speed should no longer significantly vary based on frame rate.
